tab1.title1: [NA] [Crossplay] The Ark of War 4x G/T/XP 20x H/M
tab1.text1:
Welcome to The Ark of War!

Please read the rules, by continuing to play here you are agreeing to the rules for the server.

 For Support please join the discord via the button below.

Active Admin:
Mithrim
Jetmech

Community Manager:
Zudian


Automated Restarts
World Save Interval: 10 Min
Mod(s): 
Solo Farm - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/solo-farm-mod
QoL+ - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/qol
Better Chat - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/better-chat
WBUI2 - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/wbui2
PVP Scoreboard - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/pvp-scoreboard
MX-E Ark Shop UI - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/mx-e-ark-shop-ui

Seasonal Mod(s):
Turkey Trial - https://www.curseforge.com/ark-survival-ascended/mods/turkey-trial

tab2.text1:
Admin commands logged to chat!

Non tek engrams auto unlock as you level!

Custom drop tables!
10% Structure damage weekdays!
100% Structure damage weekends!

4x Tameing
4x Gathering
4x XP
4x Mating
20x Hatching
20x Maturing
100% Imprinting Achieveable
Max wild dino lvl: 150
Tribe Size Limit: 6
No Alliances
Cave Building Enabled
No flying in caves
Flying stamina recovery enabled
Player Weight 3x
Player Fortitude 2x
Dino Stamina 1.5x
Dino Weight 2x
Stack Sizes 5x
tab2.text2:
DISCLAIMER:

By logging on to the server you are agreeing to follow ALL rules listed below and are aware that a failure to do so may result in deletion of structures/dinos and/or being banned.

General Server Rules:

No cheating. The use of 3rd party programs (Aimbot, ESP, etc.), bugs, and/or glitches/exploits will not be tolerated. If the admin receives reports about a player or tribe an investigation will be initiated.

NO INSIDE RAIDING

Keep Foundation/Pillar spamming to a minimum

Platform saddle drivers must be pickable (uncovered)

Keep chat mature. (NO Racial slurs, homophobic insults, spamming, etc)

No 123, Human, (Default) Names

Artifact cave base building is NOT permitted. (Temporary structures are allowed, NO Turrets)

Prisoners may be kept for up to 30 minutes. The captive player must announce to an admin via Discord to start the timer. Failure to do so may delay your release.

Destroy ALL taming pens (spikes, walls, etc.) when you are finished taming. This reduces server lag and keeps the admins from having to clean them up. (We HATE cleaning!)

No excessive harassment. The admins will determine if something is considered harassment or normal PvP. (In saying this, it is your responsibility to keep your dinos safe)

No building near the top of Volcano

No tree platforms near the redwoods artifact cave entrance (if your turrets become a problem because you built too close, they will be removed)

No building on icebergs that have penguin spawns

No building on Obelisks

No building to block major resource areas. (Resource Mountains, Major Penguin spawns, etc) ((Temporary strucutures are OK Ex: Taming Pens))


Raiding:

If you are raiding, only destroy/kill what is necessary to obtain any desired loot.. Anything that is locked is fair game. That said, collateral damage (within reason) happens.

Prisoners of war (during raids only) may be kept until completion of the raid.\nnRaids against a tribe may be conducted for a period of 6 hours max. The timer starts when any explosive device is used against the defending tribe. You must have the intent to infiltrate and loot the defending tribes base when a raid is initiated.

Clean up raid structures (FOB) In a timely manner after the raid ends.

Killing of passive dinos within a base without the intent of raiding can be considered harassment. (Playes and dinos on neutral/agressive are fair game!)

As hard as we try admins can not be on 24/7/365. If there is ever an issue and an admin is nowhere to be found ...SCREENSHOT IT! As we say “pics or it didn’t happen.”

Admin's will not replace items / dinos lost due to bugs in the game. A search for dinos that have fallen through the world will be conducted. The dino(s) will be retrieved if possible.
